Interface AssignTaskViewController.ViewListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssignTaskController
    Enclosing class:
    AssignTaskViewController

    public static interface AssignTaskViewController.ViewListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteUser(User user)
      This function is used by the AssignTaskViewController to delete a user assignment to the task.
      void goBack()
      This function is used by the returnButton to go back to the TaskView.fxml.
      void onAssignTask(User user)
      This function is called by the assignButton to assign a task to a user.

    • Method Detail

      • goBack

        void goBack()
     throws NavigationException
        This function is used by the returnButton to go back to the TaskView.fxml.
        Throws:
        NavigationException - if the listener couldn't load the previous view.

      • onAssignTask

        void onAssignTask(User user)
        This function is called by the assignButton to assign a task to a user.
        Parameters:
        user - on which we add a task assignment.

      • deleteUser

        void deleteUser(User user)
        This function is used by the AssignTaskViewController to delete a user assignment to the task.
        Parameters:
        user - on which we want to remove the task assignment.
